thread.title: Facebook forming a new blockchain group, headed by Coinbase board member

author: Evelyn Cheng
title: Facebook forming a new blockchain group, headed by Coinbase board member
text: Facebook forming a new blockchain group, headed by Coinbase board member Evelyn Cheng Reblog "I'm setting up a small group to explore how to best leverage Blockchain across Facebook, starting from scratch," David Marcus said in a post Tuesday afternoon on the social media site. The news came as Facebook implemented its biggest executive shakeup in 15 years, Recode reported Tuesday. "I'm setting up a small group to explore how to best leverage Blockchain across Facebook, starting from scratch," Marcus said in a post Tuesday afternoon on the social media site.
